name: playwright-cucumber-framework
description: Multi-environment Playwright test framework with Allure reporting

scripts.test:dev:pom: npm run clean:reports && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT=DEV-POM npx playwright test && npx allure generate reports/allure-results/dev/pom --clean -o reports/allure-results/dev-report/pom
scripts.test:dev:codegen: npm run clean:reports && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT=DEV-CODEGEN npx playwright test && npx allure generate reports/allure-results/dev/codegen --clean -o reports/allure-results/dev-report/codegen
scripts.test:dev:combined: npm run clean:reports && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_PROJECT=DEV-COMBINED npx playwright test && npx allure generate reports/allure-results/dev/combined --clean -o reports/allure-results/dev-report/combined
